General.Name: Microelectronics Technology Inc
General.Description: Microelectronics Technology Inc. designs, manufactures, and sells microwave and satellite communication products in the United States, Mainland China, and internationally. The company offers wireless communication products, including satellite communication equipment, terrestrial microwave radios for cellular backhaul, mobile transceiver base station modules and subsystems, wireless broadband access terminals, and radio frequency identification (RFID) readers and modules. It also provides low noise block down converters; very small aperture terminal RF equipment for satellite broadband applications; transceivers and flat panel antenna modules; 4G/5G radio units; microwave and millimeter-wave transceivers and outdoor units; and RFID products. The company was incorporated in 1983 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.
General.Address: Hsinchu Science Park, Hsinchu City, Taiwan, 300
